title: Restraint
description: Luke's a top who loves to dance on the edge of safety with hot men who crave knives and cutting with their kinky sex. Playing such potentially risky games, Luke's control needs to be as steely as his handcuffs, as honed as his blades. Adorable, inexperienced Ethan tests all Luke's self-restraint--but Ethan is more than he appears, and Luke may be the one who's being tested.
author: Teresa Noelle Roberts
